name: Add new Mailrelay subscribers from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new subscriber is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new one to Mailrelay. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1STwOQyDD-ufDsQAV9yqPYGEvVsUWAmrss1QV2OOj-zA/edit?usp=sharing).
